import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { makeStyles, withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import {grey} from "@material-ui/core/colors"; const foodAccomContactFBButton = withStyles({ root: { fontSize: "2.5vw", boxShadow:"none", textTransform:"none", fontWeight:"bold", border:"1vw, 2vw, 1vw, 2vw", fontFamily: "Georgia", height:"15vw", wdith:"30vw", backgroundColor: grey[500], "&:hover": { backgroundColor: grey[700] } } })(Button); const BootstrapButton = withStyles({ root: { boxShadow: "none", textTransform: "none", fontSize: "3vw", padding: "6px 12px", border: "1px solid", lineHeight: 1.5, backgroundColor: "#007bff", borderColor: "#007bff", fontFamily: [ "-apple-system", "BlinkMacSystemFont", '"Segoe UI"', "Roboto", '"Helvetica Neue"', "Arial", "sans-serif", '"Apple Color Emoji"', '"Segoe UI Emoji"', '"Segoe UI Symbol"' ].join(","), "&:hover": { backgroundColor: "#0069d9", borderColor: "#0062cc", boxShadow: "none" }, "&:active": { boxShadow: "none", backgroundColor: "#0062cc", borderColor: "#005cbf" }, "&:focus": { boxShadow: "0 0 0 0.2rem rgba(0,123,255,.5)" } } })(Button); const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ margin: { margin: theme.spacing(1), } })); function App() { const classes = useStyles(); return (

{"Ava's Angels In Action"}

This is a responsive web application designed to provide information about the local area such as food, charity, accomodation.
In addtion, as well as providing the opportunity for user to leav feedback or contact details for the charity.
Finally, a virtual assistant will help you with quick queries.



Food

About Us

Helping families with sick children in hospital. Providing relief of sickness and suffering among children being cared for in hospital by providing items, services and emotional support for families to enable them to visit, spend quality time with and care for such children.
